Description:
INVEST FOR THE FUTURE
It's hammertime for this 1950's home! Bargain priced property needs a keen renovator with lots of ideas and tools to bring back the sparkle or an investor/developer to capitalise on the generous block size and excellent location.
The weatherboard home includes front and rear patios, two bedrooms, L-shaped lounge dining room featuring tapestry brick fireplace with wood heater plus split system air conditioner, original kitchen with electric cooking, large sunroom beside rear vestibule, laundry and WC.
Outside there's a single garage and sundry shedding in the big, fully-fenced and level backyard.
The approx. 1082 square metre block, (19m x 57m), offers great potential for future development/subdivision (STCA).
The top position offers the ease of public transport at your doorstep and is only a five-minute drive to the hospital precinct or CBD.
Don't procrastinate – this one has plenty of appeal for the budget conscious first home buyer, investor or builder/developer.
Insights: 447 Napier Street, White Hills VIC 3550 was last sold in 2018 and 9 other 2 bedroom house in White Hills have recently been sold.

Description:
Quiet location, spacious family living!
Offering exceptional family living in a quiet court and close to cafes, schools, bus services, local amenities and parklands, this stunning home offers the perfect combination of style and convenience. Boasting 4 bedrooms, master with ensuite, walk-in robe and ceiling fan, complemented by an additional 3 generously sized bedrooms, this immaculately presented home is perfect for the growing family. The stylish kitchen comprises of stone bench tops and provides modern functionality with stainless steel appliances, butler's pantry and dishwasher setting the standard for high-quality living and entertaining. Make the most of the seamless transition between spacious living indoors and alfresco providing a delightful space for relaxing or dining, winter or summer. With an abundance of space, you will be spoiled for choice with a kitchen/meals/living zone, separate lounge/rumpus is perfect to sit back and relax after a hard day's work. Step outside to a good size backyard perfect for the kids to play or to add a pool as your own little slice of heaven. Further benefits include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, double garage with internal access. Situated on a generous 769m2 approx. allotment and providing a host of benefits, this stunning home offers the luxurious lifestyle that you have been dreaming of for you and your family.
Insights: 3 Ironhill Close, White Hills VIC 3550 was last sold in 2018 and 11 other 4 bedroom house in White Hills have recently been sold.

Description:
Fantastic Investment Property
Conveniently located within a few minutes drive to Epsom Shopping Village and less than 10 minutes to the CBD also the bus stop is only a couple of doors away. The home is just about opposite the gorgeous Botanical Gardens. Featuring spacious open plan kitchen / dining and family room with stunning floating floors. Two bedrooms with BIR.s and tiled central bathroom. The garage has been converted to a further living space/3rd bedroom. Fully fenced and secure with a private picturesque fully landscaped and paved courtyard. Space for off street car parking. Currently let to a terrific tenant paying $250 p.w and leased until Feb 2019.

Description:
HUGE 1293m2 BLOCK, BIG POTENTIAL!
If opportunity knocks only once, then you will not want to pass up on this prime piece of Bendigo real estate! Whether you are searching for business or personal gain, the potential is obvious! And, with some astute thinking and clever foresight, you just might be the lucky buyer to unleash it!
Located in close proximity to Lake Weeroona, Weeroona College and only a short drive to the Bendigo CBD, the property has a plethora of possible suiters. Set on a huge 1293m2 (approx.) allotment with approximately 20 metres frontage, the property will provide maximum exposure and is ideally converted to a medical practice, dentist surgery, chiropractor, home business or other commercial entity
The existing double fronted cream brick residence is attractive from the road and certainly worthy of a new lease of life! Renovate and/or extend for personal or business reasons, or potentially demolish and develop the block (STCA), the choice is yours to make! In mostly original order, the floor plan is liveable for the now but will benefit from a renovation in the near future. Its current configuration boasts three carpeted bedrooms (or consulting rooms), large open plan kitchen and lounge area (ideal for a reception/waiting room area), three piece bathroom and separate laundry at the rear.
Outside, the 1293m2 (approx.) allotment is a blank canvas ready for your ideas. There is an existing lock up garage/workshop providing undercover car parking, and some sundry shedding/carports at the rear. If your purpose is business orientated, there is loads of room for a car park suitable for 15 or more cars or more shedding. For personal use, the possibilities for a fabulous yard and garden are endless!
A rare opportunity to purchase a raw slice of your personal or professional future. Currently leased at $295 per week, the property is earning an income in the interim whilst you decide what to do in the future!
Insights: 390 Napier Street, White Hills VIC 3550 was last sold in 2018 and 40 other 3 bedroom house in White Hills have recently been sold.

Address: 91 St Killian St White Hills VIC 3550
Description:
Ideal family home or investor home
- Lovely three bedroom brick veneer family home in great location
- Master bedroom with ensuite and walk in robe
- Low maintenance block perfect for downsizers
- Close to all amenities and only minutes to central Bendigo
- Leased to good tenant at $295 per week, ideal investment home
- Ducted gas heating and split system for all seasons
- Double carport with access internally
- Fabulous location close to all amenities and schools
Directions to this lovely home are best by going to the corner of Harold Court and St Killian Street, the home facade fronts Harold Court. You will be pleasantly surprised by the lovely home and the great location. White Hills is the home of the Botanic Gardens and is approximately 4.6km to the Bendigo CBD. For those wanting the perfect investment the home is leased at $295 per week to very good tenants.

Description:
AS NEW - NOTHING TO DO!
Built in 2013, still under Builder Warranty Insurance, this very neat home is sited on a low maintenance block in a quiet court with only 10 other dwellings. Ducted heating and cooling ensure year round comfort, whilst the 3KW solar power back to the grid keeps energy costs to a minimum, in a home that is also very low maintenance. Featuring 3 good sized bedrooms, main with walk-in-robe and ensuite, the others with built-in-robes, separate lounge, kitchen with dishwasher, generous pantry and a study nook, you could just move in and relax. The double garage has excellent height clearance, remote roller door, internal access to the home and a single rear roller door accessing the back yard. The covered Al Fresco area is a very generous 17.82m2, a great size for entertaining family and friends. Schools, public transport, Aldi and the expanded Epsom shopping centre are in close vicinity. So don't delay, a truly " No Worries" prospect!!

Description:
Walk to the White Hills Primary School
The first thing you notice about this home is the location, it's hidden down a quiet Street that features privacy and peacefulness. Located close to everything that the White Hills area has to offer, this 4 bedroom property is perfect for a growing family, being a short walk to White Hills Primary School, the shopping strip, the White Hills oval, Botanic garden and swimming pool.
Built solid, this 4 bedroom home offers so much to so many. Large, open and generous living and dining spaces. The main living and dining area is open plan and large enough for an oversized couch set, large dining room table and will setup the home beautifully. The second living is perfect for a cinema room or children's hideaway. The home features central heating and cooling throughout the property.
The Master bedroom with ensuite and dual built in cupboards offers privacy and a great area to get away from it all, while the 3 other bedrooms are a mix of sizes, one with outdoor access, making it potentially perfect for the short stay accommodation market.
The kitchen is well placed within the home to provide both a practical and connected element to the property. Featuring a gas bench top stove, electric oven and dishwasher, Walk in Pantry, plenty of cupboard space and a breakfast bar, this light filled kitchen has plenty of family meals left in it yet, or could be given an update easily.
The main bathroom includes both a shower and a bath, vanity, mirror and separately located toilet. It's easy to see a buyer living in the house as is or extracting more value from it by updating the kitchen and bathroom over time.
With so many features, it's difficult to mention them all, but keep in mind that this property also includes a good sized study with plenty of space for dual desks, single carport with attached double lockup garage, a large sized backyard that is perfect for green thumb, water tank, separate shed, and a back veranda suited to large family or friend gatherings with an outdoor 5 person spa already at the property.
If you are a first home buyer, a growing family looking for more room, an investor or short stay accommodation newbie or expert, then this is the property for you to check out. You might be overwhelmed by everything it has to offer, but you won't be left disappointed.
Insights: 9 Sharyn Street, White Hills VIC 3550 was last sold in 2018 and 11 other 4 bedroom house in White Hills have recently been sold.

Description:
Spacious living in Peppercorns Estate.
Situated on approx. 643m2 sits a beautifully designed family home featuring multiple living areas, 4 spacious bedrooms with ensuite and walk in robe to master, alfresco dining and low maintenance gardens.
A solid build, this home has all the bells and whistles with a well-designed kitchen featuring generous pantry and storage, gas cook top and large island bench overlooking the tiled dining room and light filled family room whilst the formal lounge has direct access to the undercover alfresco area.
The rear wing of the house is where you will find the remaining three bedrooms, central family bathroom, separate laundry and toilet. All bedrooms feature built in robes and are of a generous size. Creature comforts are maintained with ducted heating and cooling throughout
Outside boasts low maintenance, drought proof landscaping including various natives and shady trees plus garden shed, rainwater tank and clothes line. The securely fenced backyard also has double gates, allowing for side access to bring in trailers or a caravan.
The walking tracks along the Bendigo creek are an absolute delight, leading to Lake Weeroona, the Bendigo CBD and beyond.
The benefits of living in the desirable Peppercorns Estate range from a sense of community amongst neighbours, quality homes in the estate all whilst being moments to the Bendigo CBD.
To view this outstanding property, call Mitch today on 0400 601 779.

Description:
HOME ON TWO TITLES
A rare find, this exceptional property is a hidden treasure in a prominent location consisting of a spacious and updated 3 bedroom house, in-ground pool, double carport, large workman's shed and a separately titled paddock at the rear accessible by Hall Street. In all, the property including both titles, measures approximately 3340m2 with the house block measuring approximately 870m2. Perfectly positioned on the corner of Napier and Hall Streets the property has easy access to the rear paddock which would be ideal for further shedding, storage or further development (STCA).
The house itself is full of character and charm and has been updated in the kitchen area and extended to include a second living space. The main lounge is enormous while the bedrooms provide ample space. Hydronic heating throughout ensures comfortable living during the winter months while external security shutters leave this home feeling safe and secure.
Move in and enjoy, add your own touch or simply purchase as a land bank option with future plans in mind.

Description:
A dream home and tenant for the investor!
*Family home with three bedrooms and two with their own ensuite
*Beautiful open plan living in a quiet cul-de-sac with tiled flooring and quality appliances
*Split system heating and cooling for all seasons
*Built 2016/17 and in great condition with builder warranty still current.
*Perfect for the first home buyer or investor. Leased at $350 per week - great investment!
*Double garage with auto and alfresco
*Very boutique sub-division close to the Bendigo CBD and short walk to the Botanic Gardens
*Close to all amenities including, bus, shops and recreational facilities
This quality built home is unique in offering three bedrooms, all with built in robes and two with ensuites. The home is surrounded on two sides by a reserve outlook. The home offers open plan living and is on a very low maintenance allotment of 359m2. Beautifully finished throughout with quality fittings the home is perfect for the investor with an excellent long term tenant. The tenant is keen to stay long term making this an excellent investment. People love living in this quiet court close to all amenities and only minutes to the CBD.

Description:
Very nice as new family home - perfect investment
*Family home with three bedrooms and three bathrooms - Architect designed.
*Beautiful open plan living in a quiet cul-de-sac with vinyl plank flooring and quality appliances
*Ducted gas heating and evaporative cooling for all seasons
*Built 2016/17 and in as new condition with builder warranty.
*Perfect for the first home buyer or investor. Leased at $350 per week - great investment!
*Double garage with auto and alfresco
*Full turnkey - simply move in to this classy residence
*Very boutique sub-division close to the Bendigo CBD and short walk to the Botanic Gardens
*Close to all amenities including, bus, shops and recreational facilities
This quality built home is unique in offering three bedrooms and three bathrooms all on a low maintenance block. The home offers open plan living and is on a very low maintenance allotment of 416m2. Beautifully finished throughout with quality fittings the home is perfect for the investor with an excellent long term tenant. People love living in this quiet court close to all amenities and only minutes to the CBD.

Description:
Classic Californian Bungalow in Popular Park Precinct
A real surprise packet upon inspection as to what this property offers. Features include 3 good size bedrooms, formal lounge, central kitchen with gas cooking, 3 piece bathroom and powder room, 2 reverse cycle split systems for heating and cooling plus a second living area to the rear of the home. From inside to out the property includes excellent shedding/garaging plus a carport, covered outdoor entertaining and a very handy separate bungalow with bathroom, that turns this property into a 4 bedroom 2 bathroom home, ideal for a family with teenagers wanting their own space. The position is family friendly and offers numerous lifestyle opportunities with the nearby Botanical Gardens and newly built innovative modern park "Garden of the future" next door. A highly sought after style of home this property boasts many of the classic features you look for in a Californian Bungalow, and with your own touch you could turn this property into a real show piece. Enjoy the location, the big back yard and classic feel of the period.
